author: ayza
msg: Remove duplicate test run if -Dtest.case is specified. Someone may use -Dtest.case=<test class> -Djava.awt.headless=true in case of single headless test run.

author: chirino
msg: Added a new windowSize field to the ProducerInfo command and added a new ProducerAck command.  These will be needed to implement better producer flow control
where threads do not block on the broker side.

author: dims
msg: Make the Schema's present in myService/META-INF available. Especially useful when one has a wsdl with bunch of schemas and would like to use "useOriginalWSDL" flag.

author: rhs
msg: added test harness, tests, and a few missing pieces of implementation

author: joerg
msg: COCOON-2021: prevent NPE in case session is not available
